title: Gangplank returns and the event end draws near

replies.body:
Um I take it you're re-enabling him before the 10th then?

Unless this is some kind of weird joke. "Oh we've announced a new skin earned by playing GP but you can;t actually play him".

Maybe I'm too cynical.
they've announced already that hes going to be re-enabled before the event ensa so if you want to play him you can
Ah I must've missed that. Thanks.
Ze saltiness is in the air, or am I missing something?
You can't even purchase Gangplank at the moment bahaha
...and here I was thinking he'd lost his head. well played guys. well played.
{{champion:103}}
Hows about unlocking him to play before giving out skins for playing him . . . . I think it should just come free for that stuff up RITO

Well considering that you do **unlock** the skin for free if you own GP and play at least one matchmade (no custom game) with him... they are giving the skin for free. He will be re-enabled in patch 5.15 which servers go down in preparation on 06/08 -- that gives you four days to play a matchmade with him and get the skin. If you don't want it, you don't have to. It's not like they're forcing it onto you.

So if I play a full team (me and 4 other mates) on Summoner's Rift I will get a free Captain Gangplank skin after the 10 of August?
Great!
No, you have to play a game as GP to get the skin....

Oopsies I meant to say with Gangplank.
=)
The above comment can be summarized in 2 words; cheapskate and butthurt.
GP will be back after the event ends. Chill mate.
gp is back before the event ends
and then we cant get the skin dumbass
Oh go cry some more

I like the League Lore, it's a shame they scrapped the old lore and it's in a bit of flux right now, I think it's a fantastic world with such intricate stories that I'd love to know more about.
Moving along.
Considering you get refunds for free on an online cosmetic upgrade you should count your lucky stars you get that much, let alone be complaining about not being able to get your money back on ya spooky gp skin. And then you got the nerve to complain you can't play a champion on their game because they've disabled him, be thankful you don't main azir or zed or one of the champs who're disabled for bugs every second week. He's disabled for like a week, get over ya self mate it's not the end of the world.

About the pretty lore reboot - here's some news regarding why: 

http://graham-mcneill.com/#!/la-times/

/facepalm - A comical series of events. 
After checking to see that I owned him (had to check his page in the shop, no purchase price = owned), and then waiting for him to be re-enabled I played a few games to obtain the skin.  
Skip ahead a week I check to see if the skin has turned up. Turns out I never owned him, he actually wasn't for sale while disabled and happened to be on free rotation during that week XD
Oh well.

i tried playing but didnt get the skin
help?{{champion:41}}
Can I get the skin, when I play as GP in bots game as well????
when are they re-enabling gangplank then? {{champion:41}}
when patch 5.15 comes in he should be re-enabled, that's scheduled for the 6th so that should give plenty of time.
Thanks
I only have fricken one... ONE
Does this mean the HUD is going to change back?
And of course my computer still can't play League and I'm missing out on all the free stuff. Thanks a lot...
{{item:3829}} is soo OP
Does this count if i've played the old GP on free week??

You have to OWN Gankplank as a champion in order to get the skin. So if you played him while he was free-to-play, that doesn't count I'm afraid. But if you already own him and have played him in a matchmade prior to him being disabled, you've already done what was necessary and you'll just have to wait until they roll out the skin to those who've completed it

GP will be re-enabled per patch 5.15 which will be released in time before the event ends. If you already played a matchmade game with GP before he got disabled due to the Bilgewater storyline, you'll get the free Capt. GP skin when they finally roll it out to those who earnt it. 

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce - servers go down on the 6th of August in prep for the new patch update. That means from the 6th you have approximately four days left to play one matchmade game (customs don't count) with GP to unlock the skin when they roll it out.

Hope this clears any confusion you guys have!
So does playing Gangplank on Butchers bridge count towards earning the skin?
The ARAM Queue is matchmade so it should count yes
does aram count towards the captain gp skin?
It's matchmade, so yes. Matchmade games are any game where you queue up to be placed into a game with other people, so it excludes custom games
**_I don't own gangplank but i did play him when he was "Free to play" so will i get the skin riot??_**
"All players who **own** and play (or have already played) an entire matchmade game as Gangplank during the event will receive the Captain Gangplank skin for free." If you don't own him, no dice!
Gangplank will be playable again on the release of Patch 5.15 which is out sometime before August 10th.

I think, Act 1 of the story and Act 2 of the story, GangPlank was enabled and free to play, so if you had a game with GP when Act 1 and Act 2 was on then you will get the free skin, when act 3 came out they disabled GP till the 10th meaning you had to play him during Act 1 and 2 to get the skin. So possibly a bunch of people missed out on getting it for free but no doubt riot will have it for sale so at the end of the day you could just buy it if your that much of a GP fan.
It says you have to own him to receive the skin so him being free to play is irrelevant.

"But what is dread may never die"

Found it, nice try rito.
{{champion:103}} is sexy isnt she?Leave a comment
Do i still get a skin even if i didnt get to play as {{champion:41}}???
doesnt have gp T_T
Nice little Game of Thrones reference there "What is dread may never die"
